body: Better make them an adaption to this🖕
My friends and I quote this comic all the time. In fact, if there were any one doujin that was meme worthy, this would definitely be it.

Some stories are conventional, others boring, others funny, others wholesome, others steamy, erotic, imaginative...
But Energy Kyo-ka is so over the top.... I think none other is like this one. 
(And if there is, tell me! I wanna know!)
"Japanese dicks big and hard" im dying xdxdxd ohohoho

Love this manga-ka's work.On my top 10 favorites as of lately. Line work, expressions and sequential timing is superb IMHO. Hope to see more of their work and to pick up some physical copies in the future! :3
Least we finally know the name of Kyouka's brother. That's one mystery solved.
The ova didn't do this series justice
Its a damn shame I can't fap to this properly, the art is gorgeous but I just can't get pass a few pages without laughing.
